old:
竜の命とて永遠ではない――
人の命は言わずもがな――
new:
A dragon can not live forever,
nor can a human.
Impermanence is the natural order of things.

old:
なぜ我らには無限が与えられなかったのか――
永遠の有無を決めたのは何者だろうか――
new:
Why were we not granted immortality?
Who decides what can last for eternity?

old:
理の造物主を知りたくば――
竜になるより道はない――
new:
If I wish to know the Maker,
I have no choice but to become a dragon.
